title: Radcliff Kentucky Accident Attorneys | Skeeters, Bennett, Wilson & Humphrey
text: For over 50 years, Skeeters, Bennett, Wilson & Humphrey has been the trusted legal advisor for families, businesses, and institutions in Radcliff and the surrounding areas. With a long history of excellence, our firm has established a reputation for providing exceptional representation and delivering outstanding results for our clients. Our firm provides a big-city experience with a hometown personal touch. Some of the different types of cases we handle include: - Personal injury law claims resulting from auto accidents, big truck accidents, pedestrian accidents, drunk driving accidents, and dog bites—with a focus on serious, life-changing injuries - Wrongful death claims for those who have lost a loved one - Estate planning services, including wills, trusts, powers of attorney, and nursing home protection plans, to provide families peace of mind - Probate and trust administration services to handle the distribution of assets in a loved one’s estate - Business and institutional services for new and existing businesses, as well as community institutions like credit unions, banks, water districts, and school boards - Real estate services, including titles, title insurance, and loan closings We’re always up for a challenge—and our personal injury law legal talent allows us to handle cases other firms won’t touch. Contact us today to learn more about how we might be of service to you.
